name: Death Metal Band Name Generator
description: Unleash the sonic brutality! Our Death Metal Band Name Generator conjures up the most guttural, bone-crushing, and downright evil band names this side of the underworld. Prepare to melt faces!
introduction: Ready to shred? But your band name sounds like a kitten sneezing? Fear not, metalhead! This generator spews forth names so dark, so brutal, they'll make your eardrums bleed (metaphorically, of course... unless?). Get ready to unleash aural devastation!
howToUse: Click the 'Generate' button. That's it! No sacrifices required (this time).
Keep clicking until you find a name that makes your soul feel nice and corrupted.
Slightly tweak the generated names to make them your own – add a 'The' or misspell something for extra kvlt points.
Brace yourself for world domination (or at least a decent gig at the local dive bar).

faqs.question: Is this generator actually evil?
faqs.answer: Probably not... but we can't guarantee it won't summon a minor demon. Use with caution (and maybe a pentagram-shaped coaster).

faqs.question: Can I use these names for other things besides death metal bands?
faqs.answer: Technically, yes. But using 'Gore-Soaked Puppy Farm' for your daycare might raise some eyebrows. We recommend sticking to metal.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the names?
faqs.answer: Click 'Generate' again, you unholy ingrate! The abyss has endless names to offer. Or, you know, come up with your own. But where's the fun in that?

faqs.question: Will using one of these names guarantee me fame and fortune?
faqs.answer: No guarantees, but a killer name is half the battle! The rest is talent, practice, and maybe a little luck (or a pact with the devil).

faqs.question: Are the names copyrighted?
faqs.answer: Nope! They're freshly spawned from the depths of our twisted imaginations. Feel free to use them, abuse them, and spread them like a plague.

faqs.question: Can I suggest words to add to the generator?
faqs.answer: Hell yes! We're always looking for new ways to corrupt the English language. Send your darkest, most depraved word suggestions our way!
